summary: The team discussed the issue of agents speaking for others and proposed changes to the system prompt to ensure each agent speaks only for themselves.

backlog_deltas.title: Modify system prompt to explicitly state that each agent's response should be independent and not include or comment on the responses of other agents.
Update system prompt for each agent with a very explicit instruction: 'CRITICAL: Do NOT include, summarize, or comment on the responses of other agents. Respond ONLY as [Your Persona Name].'

Add a very explicit instruction to each agent's prompt: 'CRITICAL: Do NOT include, summarize, or comment on the responses of other personas. Your response must be entirely independent and only represent [Your Persona Name]'s perspective.'

Add a clear instruction to each agent's system prompt: 'CRITICAL: When responding, ONLY provide information from your own persona. Do NOT include, summarize, or comment on responses from other agents (Jordan, Mike, Alex, Sarah).'
